很用心的教授，很有趣的一堂課，但作業有點多

I appreciate the case-oriented teaching of this course, everything is great! I hope that Professor can construct a better evaluation mechanism and criteria to make it really fair to everyone. Thank you Professor.
增加理論層面的教學

The course was very interesting. I would say my main criticism is the amount of material that was taught in Chinese (as this is generally an English course). As a non Chinese speaker, this felt slightly frustrating on some occasions.

Thank you for the great opportunity professor, but since it is English course, I felt trouble that the process of projects needed Chinese. Because of that, the work distribution was unequal, and also I felt excluded most of the time.
I hope that our class final exhibition would be successful!
雖然有時候因為語言能力聽不懂其他同學的發言，整體上在這堂課學到很多從來沒有接觸過的案例、知識，喜歡這堂課，謝謝老師！: )
